title: (x) Logo Book by Michael Evamy: thin grot / body text font - any ideas? - Typ 1451 {Rainer}
content:
Logo Book by Michael Evamy  
Published by Laurence King  
Designed by Spin

ISBN-13: 978-1-85669-528-2

Been trying to work out what this is and can't figure it out.

Any ideas as to what the font is in this image?

Many Thanks to anyone who can help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202112209im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2216_6459_4019.JPG.jpeg)
author: Ashleyco
